channel.title: Cheezscape server questions
channel.description:
hello. i am working on a server for the first time. i decided to download cheezscape source to edit. i have questions on the following topics:
how to make everywhere the wild except in the bank
make npc's retaliate and follow you after you attak them
create shops
make npcs talk out load
make npc's into shops when someone talks.
thats all for now. the first one is the most immportant right now[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 13, 2008, 12:20:31 AM[/size][hr]i cant find this on tuts so if u give me one ill report it as spam
